title: Hour 3 - Marv Albert (07-01-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Marv Albert (07-01-20)
description:
Marv Albert tells Dan that Michael Jordan's flu game or food poisoning game is the best performance that he has ever witnessed in person during his broadcasting career.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
